Text:
VIRUS ALERT..!

The Soundfrost Redirect Virus forcibly redirects every known browser (Google Chrome, Firefox and Internet Explorer). It incorporates java script coding to appear as a legitimate internet browser, which is why many anti-spyware programs are unable to detect it as a virus.

http://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/forum/windows_7-system/soundfrost-virus/32f9400d-bfda-4552-9774-e8167b8dc74b

http://blog.jupitersupport.com/redirect-virus-soundfrost-org-removal-guide/

...!!!...
